chat_history.message: Hello, My product iPhone 12 mini has the above problem: Why doesn't it arrive? The delivery should have taken place on May 28th, then on May 29th, and now today. It hasn't arrived yet again. What's going on? Thank you for your help,

Dear ecomobile,

The customer has not yet received the delivery.

Could you please contact the supplier and ask where the package is.

Udo Jöbges
Auf der Roer 26
52355 Düren
Deutschland
+491737301617
udo.joebges@yahoo.de

Regards,
Ercan from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

Kindly assist the customer in preparing a handwritten CND with the IMEI of the device and their ID. We will check with our logistics partner. Thank you.

Regards,
AS

Dear Backcare,

Please find the attached POD. Thank you.

Regards,
CH
